info.name: Facebook NEW Layout (Broken)
info.description: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH DARK MODE Check out my other theme for that!!
info.additionalInfo: I love the new layout facebook unveiled recently but all the elements on the page are a bit too similar and there is a bit too much empty space on the feed, so I just changed a few colors here and there, added a bit of shadow and removed some bloats to make the whole experience much more beautiful.
